column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " The whole city is falling to pieces . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Mako , our family 's down there . "
#Text=Mako says : " Move over , we 're getting them out . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Oh , you think just because you dated Asami , you know how to fly this better than me ? "
#Text=Mako says : " Yeah . "
#Text=Chow says : " Bolin ?
#Text=This whole block is about to go up in flames .
#Text=Come on , Mako and I have an airship on the roof .
#Text=" Tu says : " We ca n't .
#Text=Grandma wo n't go .
#Text=" Yin says : " This place is my whole world .
#Text=I will not leave !
#Text=Oh , but I 'm so glad my little Bolin has come back to visit .
#Text=Sit down , would you like some tea ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Grandma , we do n't have time for tea .
#Text=" Chow says : " Mom , please !
#Text=" Yin says : " No !
#Text=I ca n't abandon the place where I raised my family .
#Text=It 's my home .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Grandma , there 's one thing Mako and I 've learned from all our years on the street .
#Text=It does n't matter where you go .
#Text=If you have your family with you , you 'll always be at home .
#Text=" Yin says : " I 'm not going .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Fine !
#Text=You leave me no choice .
#Text=We 're rolling out !
#Text=" Yin says : " Wait .
#Text=Okay , let 's go !
#Text=" Tu says : " Thanks for getting us out of there .
#Text=I mean , I probably could have handled it myself if you guys did n't show up , but , thanks .
#Text=" Yin says : " May she rest in peace .
#Text=This airship is nice .
#Text=Is it our new home ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No , Grandma .
#Text=I 'm not sure where we 're gon na take you , but right now , we need to find Korra .
#Text=" Chow says : " Did something happen to the Avatar ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm afraid so .
#Text=Her airship went down somewhere in the desert .
#Text=She was coming from a military base near the Misty Palms Oasis and heading to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=If we retrace her route back to the base , we should find the wreckage .
#Text="
